game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This class represents a single game of the platformer being played. it stores the level and handles update time tracking.
    Author:
    James Talbert

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Level level
      The current Level being played.
      protected long time
      The system time when the update() method was last called.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(java.lang.String fileName)
      Starts a new Game with the given level file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearItems(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Calls clearRect on the given Graphics object, necessary for items that will be moving (such as MovingPlatform).
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Calls each item to draw it's representation.
      java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Returns the logical height and width of the level.
      void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e) 
      void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e) 
      void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e) 
      void loadLevel(java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads a new Level into the Game, the old level will be disposed of by the garbage collector.
      void update()
      Computes the time change and calls Level.updateLevel(long) on the level.

        protected long time
        The system time when the update() method was last called.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String fileName)
        Starts a new Game with the given level file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file to use as a source for level.

    • Method Detail

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a new Level into the Game, the old level will be disposed of by the garbage collector. If the level file cannot be found or parsed, the level is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the level text file to load into level.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • clearItems

        public void clearItems(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Calls clearRect on the given Graphics object, necessary for items that will be moving (such as MovingPlatform). If used, it must be called before update().
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object, should be the same graphics object passed into draw(Graphics) on it's last call.

      • update

        public void update()
        Computes the time change and calls Level.updateLevel(long) on the level.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Calls each item to draw it's representation. each Platform is limited to it's bounding rectangls for drawing.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object to draw on.

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Returns the logical height and width of the level.
        Returns:
        a new rectangle width the width/height of the level.

      • keyTyped

        public void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Specified by:
